}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *"A/N: PCB-E460-A4-LK" and "P/N: E460 Rev.A" is etched onto the bottom of the board. :This device is using an ''[[AMD]]'' Am79C978KC Ethernet/HomePNA controller.
